title: muncher
description: Describes an analyser for a particular file type for a particular language. E.g. .cs or .csproj - same language, different structure.

language.description: Computer language name for humans, e.g. Rust.

bracket_only.description: List of Regex for lines with block brackets, e.g. {}.

line_comments.description: List of Regex for full line comments.

inline_comments.description: List of Regex for inline comments.

doc_comments.description: List of Regex for documentation comments.

block_comments_start.description: List of Regex for starting a block comment.

block_comments_end.description: List of Regex for ending a block comment.

refs.description: List of Regex for `use` or `include` references. Can refer to the package, namespace or inner members.

packages.description: List of Regex for package references for the package manger. Only refer to the package, not inner members.
